text:
I am, let's just say, hanging in there. I have not been more grateful for (and actually needed) so many extensions in my entire life!
P.S. I just looked up "sorrel drink" and man oh man, that looks delicious!!!!
Can't wait to visit with you all tomorrow (at OSSSG and maybe even the Holiday party in the evening!)
